rename.to: Fix implementation of `RandomNumberExtension` in the User Guide

body:
Hi @graydavid,

Thanks for reporting the issues you discovered, and congratulations on submitting your first issue for JUnit 5! ðŸ‘ 

I will fix the issues with the implementation of the `RandomNumberExtension`

Also, just a note: because of the issue I was seeing with `TestInstancePostProcessor`, even though the junit documentation says it's appropriate for injecting dependencies, I switched to the approach that mockito is using (see [MockitoExtension](https://github.com/mockito/mockito/blob/eeeff29fabddd56c26d8e0436e9c523419a1e3d0/subprojects/junit-jupiter/src/main/java/org/mockito/junit/jupiter/MockitoExtension.java#L118)), which relies on `BeforeEachCallback` and `AfterEachCallback` instead.

issue.title: `TestInstancePostProcessor` cannot be registered via `@ExtendWith` on a non-static field

repository.name: junit-framework
repository.description: âœ… The programmer-friendly testing framework for Java and the JVM

body:
> It doesn't seem like I can reopen this issue, so I'll tag you and hope that gets a response: @sbrannen. If that doesn't work by Tuesday, I'll open a new issue and point to this comment.

Thanks for all of the feedback. Much appreciated! ðŸ‘ 

I've opened #3437 to address the underlying issue in JUnit Jupiter.
Reopening to ensure the example works against `5.10.x` since #3437 will not be addressed until 5.11.
